title: MSc Psychology at PES
content:
MSc Psychology is a new course that has been introduced in PES. I was wondering if I should consider it since it's the first year of the course. The counselor told me that 85% is needed to get placements, I have no idea what she meant by that. 

Could somebody help me understand how placements work? Also what's the hostel situation like? Is there a dress code? It is the ring road campus, are there pgs around? Also, if somebody is studying BSc psychology, how is the faculty like? Any detail would be appreciated. Thanks!

comments.body: Hey! I want to know what's the questions did they ask you in your interview?Â
Heyy are you done with yours? Can I please DM you regarding the interview.. I have mine tomorrow
